column4: hey all...I'm thinking of formatting my Acer Aspire One ZG5 and switching to Ubuntu.  Is there anything I need to know, or is it easier to just install 10.04 without formatting?

use custom partitioning, write a new file allocation table and make / about 6Gb make sawp equal to your RAM mount if you have 2Gb ram or more (or 2xRAM if you have less) then use the rest for /home. Make them all ex4 except swap which has its own
indeed, if you have like 4Gb RAM then I wouldnt bother with swap unless you are doing some intense stuff
